Introduction

Kang Hye Yeon, also known as Hyeyeon and formerly known as Dami, is a South Korean singer affiliated with SOO Entertainment. She was previously a member of the girl groups BESTie and EXID.

Kang Hye Yeon debuted as a trot singer on October 31, 2018, with her first mini-album titled “Great”.
